alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kent and northeastern Caroline Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sandtown, or 12 miles southwest of Dover, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Camden, Goldsboro, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Rising Sun, Hazlettville, Dover Base Housing, Sandtown, Wyoming, Felton, Magnolia, Henderson, Marydel, Templeville, Rodney Village, Kent Acres and Highland Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Delaware...and eastern and northeastern Maryland.
